name: Postaga
author: Postaga

sections.description:
Requires a FREE Postaga Account

Postaga’s AI Outreach Assistant helps you automate your link building and content promotion.

It first helps you find opportunities to build links and relationships. Then it finds the right contact information related to those opportunities. Next, it helps you customize outreach emails so you can add a personal touch while still working quickly. Finally, it puts it all together and sends out email sequences that can skyrocket your response rates.

This plugin simply adds a link inside the editor to launch a campaign in your Postaga Account with whatever post or page you’re editing.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/postaga directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

Once installed, the plugin will add a link inside the post editor to create a new campaign inside your Postaga account.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin work on its own?

This plugin is designed to work with your free Postaga account which you can sign up for at https://postaga.com

short_description: Postaga helps you automate your link building, content promotion, and outreach efforts with the power of AI.
